page.title: 20 LOCAL COMMENT
page.content: Local residents were asked to comment on the amenities in the area and to suggest{improvements.}On the negative side most people feel the decline of public transport in recent years is appalling,making life difficult for the old and those without cars. Transport to schools is also poor. Shops are inadequate,non-existent in Radnage,and prices are high because of lack of competition.Concern is also felt over main road speed limits, inadequate policing,refuse facilities and decline in local industry.Too much horse culture is leading to a deterioration of grazing meadows. On a more positive note,most people enjoy living in the area because of its{relative tranquillity}and are keen to help in the conservation of the countryside.
